title: Tappi Tikarrass - Live Safari Club + discography
description:
Bjork's group Tappi Tikarrass discography. Most people have this by now, but here is also the rare live Safari Club show, which includes Eythor Arnolds on backing vocals. 

BÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â­tiÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â° Fast ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â­ VÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â­tiÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â° EP (1981)
Rokk i Reykjavik (2x live tracks)(1982)
Live Safari Club (1982)
Miranda LP (1983)

Another rare Tappi Tikarrass track is one called "Sperlgar" (Asparagus....a very good track) from a compilation album "SATT 3". You can hear it at bassist Jacob Magnusson's myspace page (he is the bassist of Tappi Tikarrass and brother of Thorstein Magnusson, the guitarist of Theyr; he also played in Bjork's first groups Exodus and Jam 80...of which demos exist I think).

Tappi Tikarrass also had a scene in a 1983 icelandic movie called "Nit Lif" (Night Life)...I wonder if anyone has that rare footage.

Enjoy, seed and please check out my other rare Icelandic new-wave.
